title: Tomato Soup
tagline: Velvety smooth, deeply tomatoey. Grilled cheese's best friend.
description: Velvety smooth, deeply tomatoey. Grilled cheese's best friend.
steps: Melt butter in large pot over medium heat.
Sauté onion until soft, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes with juices, broth, and sugar. Bring to simmer.
Blend until smooth with immersion blender (or in batches in regular blender).
Stir in cream. Season with salt and pepper.
notes: San Marzano tomatoes: Worth the splurge for best flavor.
Don't boil after adding cream: It can curdle.
Make it chunky: Blend only half for more texture.
